page.title: 08EDUCATION 1
page.content: In the village of Abbotsham there is a flourishing infant and Primary School (church of England foundation) serving the children of Abbotsham or the neighbouring parish of Alwington. Alwington School closed some years ago,but a successful amalgamation followed. In addition to the Headmaster, the staff consist of 3 full-time teachers and one part-time, to serve 100 children. Although the buildings are not modern-indeed they form a pleasing architeclural group with the church-they are conveniently placed next to the playing field and the parish playground.
